vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in TokenBank.withdrawToHolder (patch_1.sol#73-78):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(_addr.call.value(_wei)()) (patch_1.sol#76)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- holders (patch_1.sol#77)
